title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. F, pt. 479 - Membership In Council Of Contracting Agencies
content:

§ 479.2 - Participation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. F, pt. 479

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 3-0301[2][b], 3- 0301[2][1]; State Finance Law, §§136-A, 138, 174; Public Buildings Law, §§8, 43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
